telecom.server.source

Class ConstantBitRate

  • java.lang.Object
    • telecom.server.source.AbstractServerThread
      • telecom.server.source.ConstantBitRate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, TrafficSource

    public class ConstantBitRate
extends AbstractServerThread
    Constant bit rate type traffic source where the server sends data packet of 800 bytes every 100 milliseconds

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class telecom.server.source.AbstractServerThread

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void send()
      Sends data packet as Constant bit rate type, if leaky bucket is enabled, fill the bucket, otherwise send packet directly to client.
